segments.text: I notice the sink first, water gushing out uncontrollably.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands there, drying a plate like nothing's wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's filthy how the water soaks everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle spreading, probably ruining the wood floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids, boy climbing to steal cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That's just greedy, taking without asking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is unstable, inviting disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl egging him on, hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Such sneaky behavior in a nice kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a clean garden, highlighting the sloppiness inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I cringe at the thought of the mess cleanup.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could all end in tears and broken things.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Ugh, the whole scene is irritating.
segments.speaker: PAR
